turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about ChemMedChem.
turn.2: ChemMedChem  ChemMedChem is a monthly peer-reviewed medicinal chemistry journal.
turn.4: It is co-owned by the 14 European chemical society members of ChemPubSoc Europe and is published by Wiley-VCH.
turn.5: What is the impact of ChemMedChem?
turn.8: In addition to original research in the form of full papers and shorter communications, "ChemMedChem" contains review-type articles (reviews, minireviews, patent reviews, essays, highlights) as well as occasional book reviews and conference reports.
turn.10: The first volume was published at the beginning of 2006 under the two founding chemical societies, the German Chemical Society (GDCh) and the Italian Chemical Society (SCI).
turn.11: How many societies are there now?
turn.12: Since then, 12 additional chemical societies have joined in co-ownership of the journal.
